name: CoCo 3 Timber Man (Clone of Mobile App)
name_original: CoCo 3 Timber Man (Clone of Mobile App)
description:
Timber Man is a game of quick reaction.  It starts out slow and increases in speed with each gaining level until it becomes unmanageable and your player dies because you ran out of time.  You play as 1 of many unlockable lumberjack's whose purpose in life is to cut down the never ending tree.  Use the joystick control to move left or right to avoid the tree branches and press the button to chop.  Don't forget to pay attention to the time bar at the bottom of the screen.

Check out the character library to see unlocking criteria for some characters.  The game saves your progress if exited properly and keeps a count of your total amount of chops.

Available for download is a zipped folder containing a .DSK virtual disk file of the game and a .PDF of the games full color manual!  This game requires a Tandy Color Computer 3 with 128k or more, some form of disk drive supporting RS-DOS, and a joystick!  Enjoy!
